snippet: Major League Soccer is prepared to start the season this weekend even if a labor dispute with its regular referees and other match officials is not resolved in time.
abstract: Major League Soccer is prepared to start its season even if labor dispute with its regular referees and other match officials is not resolved in time; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Major League Soccer is prepared to start the season this weekend even if a labor dispute with its regular referees and other match officials is not resolved in time.
